tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
quoteText: If you reside in North America (inclusive of United States, Canada, Mexico, United States territories and possessions, and United States military bases wherever located), your relationship is with Adobe Inc., a United States company, and the Terms are governed by the law of California, U.S.A.
